title: Sweet Potato Pancakes

ingredients.content: 1 oz unsalted butter, plus extra to serve
4 tsp vegetable oil, to grease, divided

preparations.content: Place sweet potatoes into mixing bowl and purée <b>6 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place butter into mixing bowl and melt <b>2 min/160°F/speed 1<b>.
Add milk and vinegar and mix <b>5 sec/speed 2<b>. Let rest in mixing bowl for 5 minutes.

Add reserved sweet potato purée, egg, brown sugar, vanilla, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and nutmeg and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix a further <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>.

Heat 1 tsp oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Ladle batter for each pancake (approx. ¼ cup) into hot skillet and cook for 2 minutes, flip and cook an additional 1-2 minutes. Serve warm with butter, maple syrup and pecans.

hintsAndTricks: Replace canned sweet pototatoes with cooked puréed sweet potatoes.
Replace 8 oz milk and 1 tbsp apple cider vinegar with 8 oz buttermilk.
